Row.Text: Recently, your Economic Advisor has been bombarding your office with folder upon folder of new schemes and projects. She wishes to explore the doctrine of economic self-reliance and expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]She awaits your decision.

For {4_Turns}, significant events related to self-reliance may occur.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Self-reliance in your Cities[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities may make donations to the pious for a sum of Faith! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The option of purchasing a Caravan Company lasting {4_Turns} may appear. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your cities may import vice into the city, producing temporary Unhappiness![ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Panics may randomly occur causing reduction of Gold in Markets and Banks.[ENDCOLOR]

For {4_Turns}, significant events related to expansion may occur.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increased trade may bring prosperity to your cities in increased tax revenues![ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities may make donations to the pious for a sum of Faith! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The option of purchasing a Caravan Company lasting {4_Turns} may appear. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your cities may import perverse vice into the city, producing temporary Distress![ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your currency may get inflated, providing less gold from City Connections![ENDCOLOR]
As the most accomplished advisor at my disposal, I believe she is the best advisor to explore self-reliance for our economy to be self-sufficient.
I believe the best interest at heart is to expand our economy as wide as the eye can see at our advisor's discretion.
I do not believe the time is right to begin experimenting with the economy. These plans will have to be put on the backburner.
